com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.ChangeEventSource, IUsersServiceAsync
public class UsersController
extends com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.ChangeEventSupport
implements IUsersServiceAsync

Wrapper for the IUsersServiceAsync with event firing capabilities.
